name: Hungry In Space
description:
I'm currently studying game design at the moment so this if a sort of re-do for my first assignment.

This is a short game where you are trying to achieve a high score by 'eating' aliens of the same colour. I might alter the game later to make it harder.

https://www.instagram.com/identifyingasaraccoon

Music made by Brandon Hombre: https://soundcloud.com/brandonhombre
